text: My body, my choice is a feminist slogan. It is used in several countries, most often for issues of bodily autonomy and abortion. Feminists usually say that people have the right to decide what happens to their body. This is especially true for sexual, marriage and reproductive choices. The slogan has been used around the world. It has been translated into many languages. It is often used during protests and demonstrations or to bring attention to different feminist issues. Category:Feminism Category:Abortion
title: My body, my choice
